## utils.svgMath namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getDocumentScroll()](./blockly.utils.svgmath.getdocumentscroll.md) | Gets the document scroll distance as a coordinate object. Copied from Closure's goog.dom.getDocumentScroll.  Object with values 'x' and 'y'.  Blockly.utils.svgMath.getDocumentScroll |
|  [getInjectionDivXY(element)](./blockly.utils.svgmath.getinjectiondivxy.md) | Return the coordinates of the top-left corner of this element relative to the div Blockly was injected into. |
|  [getRelativeXY(element)](./blockly.utils.svgmath.getrelativexy.md) | Return the coordinates of the top-left corner of this element relative to its parent. Only for SVG elements and children (e.g. rect, g, path). |
|  [is3dSupported()](./blockly.utils.svgmath.is3dsupported.md) | Check if 3D transforms are supported by adding an element and attempting to set the property.  True if 3D transforms are supported.  Blockly.utils.svgMath.is3dSupported |
|  [screenToWsCoordinates(ws, screenCoordinates)](./blockly.utils.svgmath.screentowscoordinates.md) | Converts screen coordinates to workspace coordinates. |
|  [svgSize(svg)](./blockly.utils.svgmath.svgsize.md) | Returns the dimensions of the specified SVG image. |
